content.raw:
I'm having trouble running that example on OS X. It seems to crash no matter which branch of ignition-transport I'm using:

~~~
lldb ./client 
(lldb) target create "./client"
Current executable set to './client' (x86_64).
(lldb) r
Process 49610 launched: './client' (x86_64)

libc++abi.dylib: terminating
Process 49610 stopped
* thread #1: tid = 0x545bc0, 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10, queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = signal SIGABRT
    frame #0: 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10
libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill:
->  0x7fff86245286 <+10>: jae    0x7fff86245290            ; <+20>
    0x7fff86245288 <+12>: movq   %rax, %rdi
    0x7fff8624528b <+15>: jmp    0x7fff86240c53            ; cerror_nocancel
    0x7fff86245290 <+20>: retq   
(lldb) bt
* thread #1: tid = 0x545bc0, 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10, queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = signal SIGABRT
  * frame #0: 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10
    frame #1: 0x00007fff82e329f9 libsystem_pthread.dylib`pthread_kill + 90
    frame #2: 0x00007fff8775a9ab libsystem_c.dylib`abort + 129
    frame #3: 0x00007fff876d1a21 libc++abi.dylib`abort_message + 257
    frame #4: 0x00007fff876f98f4 libc++abi.dylib`default_terminate_handler() + 46
    frame #5: 0x00007fff876f70a1 libc++abi.dylib`std::__terminate(void (*)()) + 8
    frame #6: 0x00007fff876f712e libc++abi.dylib`std::terminate() + 78
    frame #7: 0x00007fff89c7fb8b libc++.1.dylib`std::__1::thread::~thread() + 17
    frame #8: 0x000000010000b7cb client`main + 235
    frame #9: 0x00007fff8940d5c9 libdyld.dylib`start + 1
    frame #10: 0x00007fff8940d5c9 libdyld.dylib`start + 1
(lldb) 
~~~
content.html:
I'm having trouble running that example on OS X. It seems to crash no matter which branch of ignition-transport I'm using:

lldb ./client 
(lldb) target create "./client"
Current executable set to './client' (x86_64).
(lldb) r
Process 49610 launched: './client' (x86_64)

libc++abi.dylib: terminating
Process 49610 stopped
* thread #1: tid = 0x545bc0, 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10, queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = signal SIGABRT
    frame #0: 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10
libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill:
->  0x7fff86245286 <+10>: jae    0x7fff86245290            ; <+20>
    0x7fff86245288 <+12>: movq   %rax, %rdi
    0x7fff8624528b <+15>: jmp    0x7fff86240c53            ; cerror_nocancel
    0x7fff86245290 <+20>: retq   
(lldb) bt
* thread #1: tid = 0x545bc0, 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10, queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = signal SIGABRT
  * frame #0: 0x00007fff86245286 libsystem_kernel.dylib`__pthread_kill + 10
    frame #1: 0x00007fff82e329f9 libsystem_pthread.dylib`pthread_kill + 90
    frame #2: 0x00007fff8775a9ab libsystem_c.dylib`abort + 129
    frame #3: 0x00007fff876d1a21 libc++abi.dylib`abort_message + 257
    frame #4: 0x00007fff876f98f4 libc++abi.dylib`default_terminate_handler() + 46
    frame #5: 0x00007fff876f70a1 libc++abi.dylib`std::__terminate(void (*)()) + 8
    frame #6: 0x00007fff876f712e libc++abi.dylib`std::terminate() + 78
    frame #7: 0x00007fff89c7fb8b libc++.1.dylib`std::__1::thread::~thread() + 17
    frame #8: 0x000000010000b7cb client`main + 235
    frame #9: 0x00007fff8940d5c9 libdyld.dylib`start + 1
    frame #10: 0x00007fff8940d5c9 libdyld.dylib`start + 1
(lldb)

content.raw: The OS X example was failing because it was missing `aThread.join();` in the main function.
content.html: The OS X example was failing because it was missing aThread.join(); in the main function.
